document.full_text: the tampa bay rays have placed all-star third baseman evan longoria on the 15-day disabled list with a strained left oblique muscle, the major league baseball team said on sunday.
document.title: rays put longoria on disabled list with oblique strain
lines_and_colors: the tampa bay rays have placed all-star third baseman evan longoria on the 15-day disabled list with a strained left oblique muscle, the major league baseball team said on sunday.
